# Open Cap Table Protocol Canton SDK (`@open-captable-protocol/canton`)

> TypeScript SDK for interacting with the Open Cap Table Protocol (OCP) contracts on Canton.

## Read next

- Project conventions / implementation guidance: `README.md`
- Contribution workflow + patterns: `CONTRIBUTING.md`
- Lint/format: `LINTING.md`
- API docs generation (TypeDoc): `README.docs.md`

## Key commands

- Install deps: `npm i`
- Typecheck (tests config): `npm run typecheck`
- Typecheck (library build config): `npx tsc --noEmit`
- Tests: `npm test`
- Lint: `npm run lint` (fix: `npm run lint:fix`)
- Format: `npm run format` (fix: `npm run format:fix`)
- Build: `npm run build`
- Generate docs: `npm run docs`

## Repository structure (high level)

- `src/functions/`: one operation per file; exports `Params`/`Result`
- `src/OcpClient.ts`: facade wiring functions to the ledger client
- `src/types/`: public types (see `src/types/README.md` for comment policy)
- `src/utils/`: type conversions and transaction helpers
- `test/`: fixtures + schema validation helpers

## Non-negotiables

- **Strict TypeScript**: do not introduce `any`/`unknown` or broad assertions.
- **Fail fast**: validate required params; do not hide malformed data with fallback values.
- **Avoid doc duplication**: update the source-of-truth doc and link to it elsewhere.
